law.catch_line: A person who violates any provision of Title 9, Subtitle 3 of this article is guilty of a misdemeano...
law.text: A person who violates any provision of Title 9, Subtitle 3 of this article is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment in the county jail not exceeding 6 months or both.
